cucumber.runtime.java

Class BetterJavaBackend

  • java.lang.Object
    • cucumber.runtime.java.BetterJavaBackend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    cucumber.runtime.Backend

    public class BetterJavaBackend
extends Object
implements cucumber.runtime.Backend
    Improved version of JavaBackend that uses indexed annotations to find glues.
    Author:
    Kohsuke Kawaguchi
